fulltext:
Nguyen Minh Hien
Business Analyst
Date of birth:
 Jan 01, 1993
Gender:  Female
Phone:
 +84 372736693
Email:  isami1993@gmail.com
Address:
 Ho Chi Minh City.
Website:
 https://www.facebook.com/isami.chan   Skype: Isami.93
EDUCATION
Oct 2010 - May 2014
FPT University, Hanoi
Major: Corporate Finance
GPA: 7.9
WORK EXPERIENCE
Dec 2018 - now
FPT Software Ho Chi Minh
Business Analyst/ Project Manager
Main responsibilities:
- Work directly with the client to gather "what they need" 
- Analyze project's business & design wire-frames or workflow to
visualize client need 
- Finalize scope of work and support PM/ SA/ Tech lead on an
estimation phase 
- Write detailed specs based on wire-frames and scope of works 
- Control and prevent additional requirement during the implementation
phase 
- Control and analyze change request during the software development
process
- Write Tendering document and support Pre-sale projects
Aug 2017 - Dec 2018
Vingroup Joint Stock Company                                                 
(Former: Ciber - CMC|CMC Corporation)
Business Analyst -  IT Department
Main responsibilities:
-  Analysis requirements from key users. 
- Documentation: Functional Specification, Customer Requirement,
User Story, Mock up Screen. Business Process Diagram
- Partial tester. 
- Project: Vincity
Dec 2014 - Jul 2017
FPT Software Hanoi
Business Analyst - SAP B1 Consultant
Main responsibilities:
- Working at customer's site. SAP ERP B1 Consultant for small medium
enterprises at Vietnam and Asia. 
- Projects: Ford Vietnam, SCI Group, Sankei Vietnam
PROJECTS
Cloud
(3/2019 - now)
Customer
An American multinational computer technology company based in Round Rock,
Texas, United States, that develops, sells, repairs, and supports computers and
related products and services
Description
Implement cloud services for internal
Team size
ODC. 10 members
My position
Business Analyst/ Project Manager
My responsibilities
•Work directly with the client to gather "what they need"
•Analyze project's business & design wire-frames or workflow to visualize client
need
•Finalize scope of work and support PM/ SA/Tech lead on an estimation phase
•Write detailed specs based on wire-frames and scope of works
•Control and prevent additional requirement during the implementation phase
•Control and analyze change request during the software development process 
Technologies used
Cloud
IPOS
(12/2018 - 3/2019)
Customer
A French-based company, whose business is to provide the technology involved in
secure electronic transactions
Description
Implement local payment solution for POS machine
Team size
ODC. 30 members
My position
Business Analyst
My responsibilities
• Defining features list, Functional Requirement, Wireframe (mockup), User Story.
• Clarify requirement with customer
• Work with SA, technical leader about technical solution 
• Live Demo and User Manual Demo
Technologies used
Android
Vincity Project - Vingroup
(8/2017 - 12/2018)
Customer
 Vingroup Vincity
Description
SAP China is Prime contract to implement SAP RE for Vincity Project to manage
Real Estate Sales Business and Bank Integration Project Scope: SLM
Consulting,ABAP development, Process Integration, Role and Authorization
Team size
8
My position
Business Analyst
My responsibilities
• Defining Functional Specification, Testing Strategies, User Guide
• Defining processes for test plan and several phases of testing cycle.
• Ensuring all development tasks meet quality criteria through test planning,
testexecution, quality assurance and issue tracking.
• Work closely on the deadlines of the project
• Mentoring new members
• Issue Management and manager issue closure
Technologies used
SAP RE - SAP FI
Sankei VIETNAM
(3/2017 - 8/2017)
Customer
Sankei Vietnam
Description
Implement SAP ERP B1 for SANKEI VIETNAM tomanage Material Management
and Financial Accounting Business
Team size
10
My position
Business Analyst
My responsibilities
• Defining Functional Specification, Testing Strategies, User guide
• Defining processes for test plan and several phases of testing cycle.
Technologies used
SAP B1
SCI Group
(2/2017 - 5/2017)
Customer
SCI Group
Description
Implement full cycle SAP ERP B1 for SCI GROUP
Team size
7
My position
Business Analyst/ Project Manager (support phase)
My responsibilities
• Defining Functional Specification, Testing Strategies, User guide
• Defining processes for test plan and several phases of testing cycle.
Technologies used
SAP B1
SAP DNM
Ford Vietnam
(6/2016 - 1/2017)
Customer
Ford Vietnam
Description
Implement SAP ERP B1 for 27 dealers of FORD in Vietnam.
Team size
16
My position
Business Analyst - Team leader
My responsibilities
• Participate in the project planning activities and manage the execution of
projectsaccording to plan
• Manage relationship with project stakeholders, including internal and
externalclients, keeping stakeholders informed of progress and issues in order to
manageexpectations on all project requirements and deliverables.
• Proactively identify changes in work scope and ensure appropriate
planningmeasures are taken with internal and external stakeholders to reassess
and amend the scope of work requirements, budget and timeline.
• Analyse risk, establish contingency plans and identify trigger events
andresponsibilities for initiating mitigating action.
• Determine what constitutes successful closure for all parties. Gain
acceptanceand sign-off by all parties
Technologies used
SAP DNM
ACTIVITIES
2013 - 2014
FPT University
Organizer
Graduation ceremony 2013, 2014 at National Convention Center, Hanoi
Opera House.
2012 - 2014
FPT University
Vise President of Living Art Club, Member of iGo club, Vovinam Club.
- Volunteer programs: Áo ấm Hà Giang, Teaching Disable Children. 
- Event: Film Festival (2012, 2013, 2014)
2010 - 2012

Member
-Exchange student in Singapore.
10/2018
Certification of Fundamental BA Course - IIBA
6/2014
Top 50 of Summer 2014
3/2014

9/2012

English TOEIC 800+ , Japanese N3
Computer

SKILLS
INTERESTS
